title: Are we afraid of food?
description: Are food allergies on the increase and if so, why? Neil and Alice talk about the growing fear of food and teach new words.

vocabItems.definition: a condition that makes you feel ill after eating, touching or breathing in a particular substance
our body's defences against infection and disease
a protein found in wheat and some other grains
a disease caused by a lack of Vitamin D in the diet and affects bone development in children
not having enough to eat or enough of the food you need to keep you in good health
